#include<stdio.h>
 char a[20];
int main()
{
    int t,len;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
    int x,count,i;
        
    while(t--)
    {     
	len=0;
	i=0;
	scanf("%s",&a);
while(a[i]!='\0'){
len++;
i++;
}

			  
			  count =0;
              for(i=0;i<len;i++)
              {
                 switch(a[i]){
                
                               case '0' : { printf("-----"); } break;
                               case '1' : { printf(".----"); count=count+1; } break;
                               case '2' : { printf("..---"); count=count+2; } break;
                               case '3' : { printf("...--"); count=count+3; } break;
                               case '4' : { printf("....-"); count=count+4; } break;
                               case '5' : { printf("....."); count=count+5; } break;
                               case '6' : { printf("-...."); count=count+4; } break;
                               case '7' : { printf("--..."); count=count+3; } break;
                               case '8' : { printf("---.."); count=count+2; } break;
                               case '9' : { printf("----."); count=count+1; } 
                               }
              }
              printf("\n%d\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
